name: Flashy Snake - Rolling Worm All O Skins Unlocked
name_original: Flashy Snake - Rolling Worm All O Skins Unlocked
description:
A new SKIN version of slither.io available now. A dedicate server have been build to improve performance and avoid laggy!

Enjoy slithering!

Eat to grow longer!, don't run into other snake!

Can you become the longest of the day?
